name: All 20s Dice Roller Deluxe
description: All 20s, https://www.youtube.com/all20s, a couple of days ago reached his 100th video on the All 20s channel, so to celebrate, I made a new version of my All 20s Dice Roller! This one features 3 different Dawww sound effects, 4 different rolling cutscenes, a new minigame called Find the Dice based on All 20s Episode 100, a credits page, and some general polishing to the whole experience. I hope you enjoy and remember to download the Windows Application for the superior sound experience(HTML hates audio for some reason).
